As an AI language model, I do not have a personal opinion, but I can provide information on the subject. While technology has certainly brought about new ways of communicating, there are concerns that it might be causing people to become more superficial in their relationships. With social media platforms and other digital communication tools, people are able to maintain a large number of connections with others, but these connections may not be as deep or authentic. Online personas can be carefully curated and might not reflect someone's true self, creating a superficial image that doesn't accurately reflect who they are.

However, it's important to keep in mind that the way technology is used can vary greatly between individuals. Some people might use social media and other digital communication tools to foster deep and meaningful relationships, while others might use them more casually. Ultimately, the key factor in whether technology is causing people to become more superficial in their relationships is how it is used by individuals. It's up to each of us to decide how we want to use digital communication tools and to create the kind of relationships we desire.
